name: Yappie! Knockout
description:
The game features up to

24 players

Competing in a series of mini-games that take place in a colorful and chaotic world filled with traps and obstacles. The objective of the game is to be the last player standing after completing each round and avoiding elimination by falling off the edge of the platform, being knocked out by obstacles, or failing to complete the mini-game withinthe given time limit.

• Supports up to 24 players at once, matching players over the internet
• Requires skill and fast reflexes, while remaining fun and entertaining
• Tracks and obstacles are randomly generated, making each game unique
• Easy to learn and play with simple controls such as jumping and pushing
• Includes various game modes like race, team-based, survival, and more

Download Yappie now and experience the fun!
